articles.title: Singapore had a new billionaire for a few hours before Grab slid - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (Bloomberg): "The stock will go up and it will go down,” said Anthony Tan, co-founder of Grab Holdings Ltd, moments after Nasdaq’s bell-ringing ceremony in Singapore Thursday (Dec 2) night, the first such event held in Southeast Asia.
